meanings.definition: The state of being united or working together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The concertednesses of the team led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent2: The concertednesses of the choir members created a harmonious performance.
meanings.sent3: The ants showed remarkable concertednesses in building their anthill.
meanings.sent4: The concertednesses of the gears in a clockwork mechanism ensure precise timekeeping.
meanings.sent5: The concertednesses of the students in the group project impressed the teacher.

meanings.definition: The quality of being coordinated or cooperative.
meanings.sent1: The team's concertednesses in the game led to a victory.
meanings.sent2: The project's success relied on the concertednesses of all team members.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized swimming routine displayed impressive concertednesses.
meanings.sent4: The orchestra's performance showcased the concertednesses of the musicians.
meanings.sent5: The family's concertednesses in organizing the event made it a memorable occasion.

meanings.definition: The act of combining efforts or resources for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The company's concertednesses with other businesses boosted its growth.
meanings.sent2: The community's concertednesses in disaster relief efforts saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The superheroes' concertednesses defeated the villain and saved the city.
meanings.sent4: The concertednesses of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The team's concertednesses in fundraising made the charity event a success.
